CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 33, reads: "Fair Treat - Shown rockin' through a session at the Courier Home Service Fair last week are, left to right, Calvin King, Ruby Young and 'Smilin' Leroy Brown, who appeared through the courtesy of the Hurricane Bar, 2628 Centre Avenue. The gala fair was held at Hunt Armory. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Trio with Calvin King on electric guitar, Ruby Young Buchanan on organ, and Leroy Brown on saxophone, in Hunt Armory during 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
